timeline.bodyText: Pls use response.cur instead of DEFAULT_BID_CURRENCY.

timeline.bodyText: No need for this check, org.prebid.server.validation.RequestValidator#validate already does it.

timeline.bodyText: Minor. Make this variable final as of project code style.

timeline.bodyText:
Potentially, getPlc() may return NULL.
Pls use StringUtils.isNotEmpty() from apache-commons.

timeline.bodyText: No need for additional annotations here, look at org.prebid.server.json.ObjectMapperProvider for our json mapper.

timeline.bodyText: This w and h are not applied to banner.

timeline.bodyText: Format can be not defined, we need to care of it.
timeline.author: rpanchyk

timeline.bodyText:
This line actually doesn't change imps in request.
Imp is immutable object, so we need to apply here new updated list of imps.
timeline.author: rpanchyk

timeline.bodyText:
Pls check the logic in org.prebid.server.bidder.HttpBidderRequester#isOkOrNoContent method and how it is used.
Suppose, we don't need to check response codes here.
PS. other bidders can do the same but seems it is redundant action.
timeline.author: rpanchyk

timeline.bodyText: We can rid off this variable, just return banner in last line of this method.

timeline.bodyText: We don't need additional checks here since org.prebid.server.currency.CurrencyConversionService#convertCurrency already does it.

timeline.bodyText: Please don't use real URLs in tests. This can confuse when urls will be changed in configuration.
timeline.author: rpanchyk

timeline.bodyText: Would be better if we'll avoid re-assignment for variables. So, make this one final and if you want to updated it - just create another like updatedImp with desired changes.
timeline.author: rpanchyk

timeline.bodyText: Minor. Please use CollectionUtils.isEmpty(..) for format checking.
